name: Dennis Olivetti
content: Dennis Olivetti Dennis Olivetti Assistant Professor Gran Sasso Science Institute, L'Aquila, Italy Contacts Email: ti.issg@ittevilo.sinned Research Interests Distributed Computing (Congest and Local model), Algorithms, Complexity Theory, Algorithmic Game Theory Projects Round Eliminator: a tool for automatic speedup simulation.
